Entries.86571100/f Juliet 500/t 900 1600/w sunny: heavy/17 14/Juliet 32 7 0 farmer 13 18 0/skippable/animate Juliet false true 150 32 33 34/emote farmer 16/move farmer 18 0 0/move farmer 0 6 0/doAction 31 12/move farmer 0 3 0/pause 1000/stopMusic/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 3/pause 500/jump Juliet 3/pause 500/emote Juliet 40/pause 500/speak Juliet "@!$5#$b#Why are you here?$3"/quickQuestion#To see you of course!#I wanted to see Gale#I was bored(break)speak Juliet "Really? You came up here just to see me? Did someone put you up to this?$3#$b#No? Well, I'd say I'm honored but I'm actually suspicious."(break)speak Juliet "Well you're out of luck then, aren't you just?$3"(break)speak Juliet "I'm totally with you on that one. Ain't much to do in this town except charge into people's houses unannounced."/payse 500/speak Juliet "Anyway, since you're here and all, can I run something past you? You seem like you'll be honest."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/speak Juliet "Sam's always going on about this 'band' he's putting together with him and Sebastian. And I was wondering...#$b#$q 86571103/86571104/86571105 null#Should I ask to play with them?#$r 86571103 50 Jules_BandY#Yes, definitely, you rock!#$r 86571103 25 Jules_BandM#Sure, what can you lose?#$r 86571104 0 Jules_BandN#I don't think you'd fit in#$r 86571104 -50 Jules_BandS#Heck no! Your playing sucks.#$r 8571105 25 Jules_BandP#...with them musically or...?"/pause 500/speak Juliet "Well, thanks for your input. I'd better get on now and do the things. See ya 'round.$1"/end dialogue Juliet "$p 86571104#Emo-Gothboy's real keen on Abigail joining the band, so I guess there ain't much point in trying anyway.$2|I talked to Sam, and he's keen on me jamming with them! Thanks, @.$1

Run!"/speed Juliet 3/move Juliet 0 -4 0/move farmer 0 -4 0/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/warp Juliet 46 33/warp farmer 45 33/faceDirection Juliet 3/faceDirection farmer 1/viewport 37 38/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 1/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 3/pause 500/speak Juliet "Phew, that was hilarious! He's such a freaking killjoy."/pause 500/face Juliet 1/pause 500/emote Juliet 40/speak Juliet "Sometimes I just feel like I'm a kettle full of bitter, angry energy, @.$5#$b#It boils in every pore and I can't hold it back...$2#$b#Bashing the crap out of the drums helps... Smashing melons helps...But nothing really wipes away the guilt."/pause 500/shake Juliet 250/pause 500/move Juliet 3 0 1/pause 500/emote Juliet 28/pause 500/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 3/pause 500/emote Juliet 60/pause 500/speak Juliet "Yoba, listen to me. But I'm not gonna lie, it's freaking hard.$2#$b#I'm just real lucky to have people who - despite everything have got my back: Gale, Gremlin. And you.$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/speak Juliet "Thank you, @, for putting up with my BS.$4"/pause 500/emote Juliet 20/emote farmer 32/pause 400/speak Juliet "Come on, wanna do something totally crazy? Let's jump naked in the lake!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/end

Entries.Juliet_invite: Hey babe!^Guess what? The powers-that-be have granted me parole, and there's someone in Grampleton I've gotta talk to.^No pressure, but if you could come along and hold my hand - metaphorically or literally! - I could really use the company.^I'll be headed out after 5 pm, if you want to meet me at the bus stop?^- Juliet. [#]Juliet's request

Entries.86571131/t 1700 1900/n Juliet_invite: continue/viewport 12 11/farmer 12 19 0 Juliet 13 10 0/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -4 0/faceDirection Juliet 2/emote Juliet 20/move farmer 0 -1 0/move Juliet 0 1 2/speak Juliet "You came! I mean. Of course, I knew you would, cos I'm irresistable and I've piqued your curiosity...but still...$1#$b#Thank you, @. It means a lot.$4"/emote farmer 32/pause 1500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Juliet "Where are we going? Oh, to visit someone... It's time I finally laid my past to rest.$2"/faceDirection Juliet 3/speak Juliet "Come on, we should go. Let's get this done.$2"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -4 0/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/pause 800/playSound busDriveOff/pause 4000/changeToTemporaryMap Cemetery false/speak Juliet "Dammit... I'm nervous... This is my first time going to visit him. And yeah, I know it's dumb but...$2#$b#%Juliet is shaking."/pause 1000/playSound busDoorOpen/speak Juliet "Well, here we are then... the dead center of town...$2#$b#... Grampleton Memorial Garden."/pause 500/warp Juliet 11 25/faceDirection Juliet 1/warp farmer 12 25/faceDirection farmer 0/playMusic {{season}}_day_ambient/viewport 11 19/move Juliet 0 -10 0 true/move farmer 0 -10 0/pause 2000/faceDirection Juliet 1 true/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/speak Juliet "Not what you expected?"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 3/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 1/speak Juliet "Peaceful, isn't it? Kind of boring. I bet he hates it."/advancedMove Juliet false 0 -4 -3 0 0 -1/faceDirection Juliet 0/move farmer 0 -5 3/move farmer -3 0 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/Message "Nathanial Donahue^Taken too soon. Forever in our hearts."/pause 500/speak Juliet "Hey Nate. Sorry I've been a crap little sis. First I let you get yourself killed, then I fell off the damn rails and got myself exiled, so I couldn't even visit you.$2#$b#Anyhow, I'm here now and I've brought someone to meet you.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 1 true/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/emote Juliet 20/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 0/speak Juliet "Yeh life ain't too bad; I've found good people who've helped me pick up the freaking mess I'd made."/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 1/pause 400/faceDirection Juliet 0/speak Juliet "Anyway, it sucks that you didn't get this chance too, Nate. But I hope that, wherever you are, you've finally found peace.$4#$b#Either that or you're raising hell.$1#$b#Anyway, here... I brought you something. I know, it's lame and you're probably gonna hate it. But tough."/pause 500/addObject 8 10 562/pause 1500/faceDirection Juliet 1/pause 500/speak Juliet "Thanks for coming with me, @. It well... It means a lot.$4"/animate Juliet false false 4500 28/animate farmer true false 4500 101/positionOffset farmer -10 0/positionOffset Juliet 10 0/textAboveHead Juliet "<"/addTemporaryActor crow 16 16 20 9 3 false/move crow -13 0 3/showFrame crow 16/playSound crow/pause 500/jump Juliet 2/faceDirection Juliet 0 true/faceDirection farmer 0 true/showFrame crow 17/pause 500/showFrame crow 16/emote Juliet 8/pause 4000/textAboveHead Juliet "Nathan?"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 16/playSound crow/faceDirection Juliet 1/pause 1000/emote Juliet 60/pause 3000/end dialogue Juliet "Yeh, I know, it was just a passing fancy... I don't really believe my brother came back as a crow.$4#$b#But I can't help but hope there's something after death, something more than the cold, dark embrace of the void.$2"
